title: ComboBox does not receive focus when clicked on (Photon)
description: When attempting to click on the first ComboBox, it does not receive focus as expected. However, if I drop down the combo list, it will take focus.
OB: When I click on the first ComboBox, it should receive focus.
EB: When I click on the first ComboBox, it does not receive focus.
SR: The first ComboBox should receive focus when clicked on, regardless of whether the combo list is dropped down or not.
